attributes.action: Make the bbc renew their contract to continue broadcasting or drop the license fee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the recent horrifying news that neighbours -  the last bastion of quality Australian television on quality British Broadcasting might be cancelled (see here:  http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/6595591.stm) we would like to express our concern that the license fee we all pay to receive such treats is being wasted on events such as snooker, cricket and darts.

Is is particularly unfair that as students, we have to pay for a television license on a per room rather than a per house basis, and recent advertising from the BBC regarding the TV license has, furthermore, targeted students specifically. We therefore would hope, as a segment of society that contributes to the BBC's coffers so greatly, that the BBC will fulfill their obligation to us and continue to broadcast neighbours. If they do not, then it is surely about time the whole organisation came under the review of the prime minister.
